entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
